metadata.title: CVE-2021-47358 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:staging: greybus: uart: fix tty use after freeUser space can hold a tty open indefinitely and tty drivers must notrelease the underlying structures until the last user is gone.Switch to using the tty-port reference counter to manage the life timeof the greybus tty state to avoid use after free after a disconnect.
